description: Numbers that are congruent to {2, 3, 5} mod 6.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
formula: For n>0: a(n) = greatest m<=2*(n+1) coprime to a(n-1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 31 2005G.f. x*(x+2)*(1+x^2)  / ( (1+x+x^2)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Oct 08 2011
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [0..150] | n mod 6 in {2, 3, 5} ]; [From Vincenzo Librandi, Dec 25 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
